sentence: We provide HLA-SPREAD (Fig. 1) as a platform for integrated HLA resources that has been developed using NLP to understand the complexity of this locus.
Direct implementation of word tokenization, first step in dependency parsing, generates multiple tokens for single allele and disease keywords as shown in Fig. 2.
Figure 3 gives insights in using the HLA-SPREAD search.
To understand the distribution of various kinds of articles published among the filtered abstracts, we studied the article type per year trend from 1975 to 2021 (Fig. 4).
To represent these alleles in the form of a graph, we collapsed the nomenclature to two-digit level (Fig. 5).
Figure 6 represents a snapshot of common HLA associated diseases.
We observed the majority of reported associations with HLA-DRB1, followed by HLA-B and HLA-A (Fig. 7).
Figure 8 represents genomic distribution of mapped SNPs.
Figure 9 represents the frequency distribution of these matched populations belonging to the countries and ethnic groups.
We also validated our results with AFND, a manually curated database that has information about ADRs and PharmGKB (Fig. 10a and b).
Figure 10c lists the frequency-based distribution of top 20 drugs fetched from our analysis.
We provide HLA-SPREAD (Fig. 1) as a platform for integrated HLA resources that has been developed using NLP to understand the complexity of this locus.
